name: SantaClausFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Santa Claus Facts.”
”Alexa, ask Santa Claus Facts give me a fact.”
”Alexa, ask Santa Claus Facts tell me something.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa claus facts
des:
This skill will tell you a random and little known fact about Santa Claus. Some facts will completely amaze you, while others will leave you scratching your head.

This skill makes use of the Internet Chuck Norris Database API which can be found at http://www.icndb.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
